Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Libraries, Archives and Information. Stock and facilities include: A3 and A4 photocopier, fax facilities, newspapers and journals, DVDs, jigsaws, language tapes, talking books and material in the following community languages: Arabic, Bengali, Farsi, Pashto, Polish, Slovak, Somali and Urdu. Small meeting room for hire and exhibition space. Activities include Baby Time, Babyplay, Chatterbooks (aged 8-12 years) and after school clubs. The library also has a learning/homework centre. Provides 6 People's Network computers and 2 laptops with Microsoft Office, internet access and a scanner available for public use and an e-learning whiteboard facility with 8 laptops. Also hosts MP's, Councillor's surgeries, Community Police drop-in, Darnall Writers Group, Culture Lab (Art Club for 8-11s) and Stop Smoking Support drop-in.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30am-7.30pm, Tues, Wed & Fri 9.30am-5.30pm, Thurs closed, Sat 9.30am-4pm (opening times); Mon 5-6pm (after school club), Alternate Tues (Community Police drop-in), Tues 3.30-5.15pm (Culture Lab, art group for 8-11s), 1st Wed in the month 10am-12noon (Stop Smoking Support drop-in), one Wed in the month 4-5pm (Chatterbooks), 2nd & 4th Wed in the month 3.15-4.15pm (after school club), Friday 10-11am (Babyplay), 2nd Fri in the month (Baby Time), 1st Sat in the month 9.30-11am (MP's surgery), 3rd Sat in the month 10-11am (Councillor's Surgery)
